00047 const bool CExportManager::saveKey( CSwordKey* key, const bool withText ) {
00048     const QString file = KFileDialog::getSaveFileName(QString::null, i18n("*.txt | Text files\n *.* | All files (*.*)"), 0, i18n("Save search result ..."));
00049   if (key && !file.isEmpty()) {
00050         QString text = QString::fromLatin1("%1").arg(key->key());
00051         if (withText)
00052             text += QString::fromLatin1("\n\t%1").arg(key->strippedText());
00053         CToolClass::savePlainFile(file, text);      
00054         return true;
00055   }
00056     return false;
00057 }
00058 
00060 const bool CExportManager::saveKeyList( ListKey* list, CSwordModuleInfo* module, const QString& label, const bool withText, const bool showProgress ){
00061     bool ret = false;
00062     const QString file = KFileDialog::getSaveFileName(QString::null, i18n("*.txt | Text files\n *.* | All files (*.*)"), 0, i18n("Save search result ..."));
00063     if (!file.isEmpty()) {
00064         QProgressDialog progress( label, i18n("Cancel"), list->Count(), 0,"progress", true );   
00065         progress.setProgress(0);    
00066         progress.setMinimumDuration(10);    
00067         progress.show();
00068     
00069         util::scoped_ptr<CSwordKey> key(CSwordKey::createInstance(module));
00070     
00071         QString text;   
00072         int index = 0;
00073         *list = TOP;
00074         while (!list->Error() && !progress.wasCancelled()) {
00075             key->key((const char*)(*list));
00076             if (!key)
00077                 break;
00078             progress.setProgress(index++);
00079             KApplication::kApplication()->processEvents(10); //do not lock the GUI!                                                                     
00080         
00081             if (withText)
00082                 text += QString::fromLatin1("%1:\n\t%2\n").arg( key->key() ).arg( key->strippedText() );
00083             else
00084                 text += key->key() + "\n";
00085 
00086             (*list)++;
00087         }   
00088         if (!progress.wasCancelled()) {
00089             progress.setProgress(index);    
00090             CToolClass::savePlainFile(file, text);
00091             ret = true;
00092         }
00093     }
00094     
00095     return ret;
00096 }

00098 const bool CExportManager::saveKeyList( QPtrList<CSwordKey>& list, CSwordModuleInfo* module, const QString& label, const bool withText, const bool showProgress ){
00099     bool ret = false;
00100     const QString file = KFileDialog::getSaveFileName(QString::null, i18n("*.txt | Text files\n *.* | All files (*.*)"), 0, i18n("Save search result ..."));    
00101     if (!file.isEmpty()){
00102     
00103         QProgressDialog progress( label, i18n("Cancel"), list.count(), 0,"progress", true );    
00104         progress.setProgress(0);    
00105         progress.setMinimumDuration(10);    
00106         progress.show();
00107 
00108         QString text;   
00109         CSwordKey* key = 0;
00110         for (list.first(); list.current(); list.next()) {
00111             key = list.current();
00112             if (!key)
00113                 break;
00114             progress.setProgress(list.at());
00115             KApplication::kApplication()->processEvents(10); //do not lock the GUI!
00116             
00117             if (withText)
00118                 text += QString::fromLatin1("%1:\n\t%2\n").arg( key->key() ).arg( key->strippedText() );
00119             else
00120                 text += key->key() + "\n";
00121         }
00122         
00123         if (!progress.wasCancelled()) {
00124             progress.setProgress(list.count()); 
00125             CToolClass::savePlainFile(file, text);
00126         }
00127     }
00128     
00129     return ret;
00130 }

00134 const bool CExportManager::copyKey( CSwordKey* key, const bool withText ) {
00135     bool ret = true;
00136     QString text = (withText) ? QString::fromLatin1("%1:\n\t%2").arg(key->key()).arg(key->strippedText()) : key->key()+"\n";
00137 
00138     KApplication::clipboard()->setText(text);
00139 
00140     return ret;
00141 }

00143 const bool CExportManager::copyKeyList( ListKey* list, CSwordModuleInfo* module, const QString& label, const bool withText, const bool showProgress ){
00144     QProgressDialog progress( label, i18n("Cancel"), list->Count(), 0,"progress", true );   
00145     progress.setProgress(0);    
00146     progress.setMinimumDuration(10);    
00147     progress.show();
00148     
00149     QString text;   
00150     int index = 0;  
00151     util::scoped_ptr<CSwordKey> key( CSwordKey::createInstance(module) );
00152     *list = TOP;
00153     while (!list->Error() && !progress.wasCancelled()) {
00154         key->key((const char*)(*list));
00155         if (!key)
00156             break;
00157         progress.setProgress(index++);
00158         KApplication::kApplication()->processEvents(10); //do not lock the GUI!                                                                     
00159         
00160         text += (withText) ? QString::fromLatin1("%1:\n\t%2\n").arg(key->key()).arg(key->strippedText()) : key->key()+"\n";
00161         (*list)++;
00162     }
00163     if (progress.wasCancelled())
00164         return false;
00165         
00166     progress.setProgress(index);    
00167     KApplication::clipboard()->setText(text);       
00168     return true;
00169 }

00174 const bool CExportManager::printKey( CSwordModuleInfo* module, const QString& startKey, const QString& stopKey, const QString& description ){
00175     printer()->appendItem( new CPrintItem(module, startKey, stopKey, description) );    
00176     return true;
00177 }

00179 const bool CExportManager::printKeyList( ListKey* list, CSwordModuleInfo* module, const QString& label, const bool showProgress ){
00180     QProgressDialog progress( label, i18n("Cancel"), list->Count(), 0,"progress", true );   
00181     progress.setProgress(0);    
00182     progress.setMinimumDuration(10);    
00183     progress.show();
00184     
00185     int index = 0;  
00186     QPtrList<CPrintItem> itemList;
00187     QString startKey, stopKey;
00188     
00189     *list = TOP;
00190     while (!list->Error() && !progress.wasCancelled()) {
00191         VerseKey* vk = dynamic_cast<VerseKey*>(list);
00192         if (vk) {
00193             startKey = QString::fromLocal8Bit((const char*)(vk->LowerBound()) );
00194             stopKey = QString::fromLocal8Bit((const char*)(vk->UpperBound()) );
00195         }
00196         else {
00197             startKey = QString::fromLocal8Bit((const char*)*list);
00198             stopKey = QString::null;
00199         }
00200         itemList.append( new CPrintItem(module, startKey, stopKey) );
00201         
00202         progress.setProgress(index++);
00203         KApplication::kApplication()->processEvents(10); //do not lock the GUI!
00204                 
00205         (*list)++;
00206     }
00207     
00208     //add all items to the queue
00209     if (progress.wasCancelled()) {
00210         itemList.setAutoDelete(true);   
00211         itemList.clear();//delete all items     
00212         return false;
00213     }
00214     
00215     progress.setProgress(list->Count());    
00216     printer()->appendItems(itemList);   
00217     
00218     return true;
00219 }

00222 void CExportManager::printKey( const QString& hyperlink ){
00223     QString moduleName;
00224   QString keyName;
00225   CReferenceManager::Type type;
00226 
00227   CReferenceManager::decodeHyperlink(hyperlink, moduleName, keyName, type);
00228   if (moduleName.isEmpty()) {
00229     moduleName = CReferenceManager::preferredModule(type);
00230     }
00231 
00232     if (CSwordModuleInfo* module = backend()->findModuleByName(moduleName)) {
00233     qWarning(keyName.latin1());
00234     QString startKey = keyName;
00235     QString stopKey = keyName;
00236 
00237     //check if we have a range of entries or a single one
00238     if (module->type() == CSwordModuleInfo::Bible || module->type() == CSwordModuleInfo::Commentary) {
00239       ListKey verses = VerseKey().ParseVerseList((const char*)keyName.local8Bit(), "Genesis 1:1", true);
00240         for (int i = 0; i < verses.Count(); ++i) {
00241             VerseKey* element = dynamic_cast<VerseKey*>(verses.GetElement(i));
00242             if (element)
00243             CExportManager::printKey(module,QString::fromLocal8Bit((const char*)element->LowerBound()), QString::fromLocal8Bit((const char*)element->UpperBound()) );
00244             else
00245                     CExportManager::printKey(module,(const char*)*verses.GetElement(i),(const char*)*verses.GetElement(i));
00246         }
00247         }
00248     else {
00249             CExportManager::printKey(module,keyName,keyName);
00250     }
00251     }
00252 }
